name: Import from GitHub
description: Import GitHub repositories. users, issues and comments
author: Restya
settings_description:
Register a new application in GitHub in this URL https://github.com/settings/applications/new with providing below details,
Application Name: ##SITE_NAME##
Homepage URL: ##SITE_URL##
Application description: Give some description about your site
Authorization callback URL: ##SITE_URL##/apps/r_import_github/login.html
